values: （中、小）学校；全校师生；学派；流派；学校教育；学业；功课；学期；学校建筑物；校舍；（中世纪的）书院；经院；上课时间；上学阶段；上学时间；学术界；训练班；短训班；锻炼；群；一群（鱼）；科；系；研究所；讲习所；养成所；<美口>大学；学院；院校；专业学校；专科学校；[军]训练教程；操练；<英>大学学位考试科目；学位考试考场；一伙赌徒；赌博团伙
教育；训练；培养；控制；指导；使受训；使学会；使受学校教育；使成群游动（如鱼群）；磨练；训练有素
学校的；学院的；<南非>受过西方教育的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指设立有专门学科的学院，如外语学院、地质学院、建筑学院等。
主要指综合大学，一般由多个学院组成。当泛指大学时通常用college表示。
指大学所属的学院或系。
多指大学内的学院，分科学院或科目较少的高等学校。
指(高等)专科院校或研究专门学术的学校。

word_group.brief_definition: 地方教育董事会；地方教育委员会

bilingual.target: 学校？关于学校有什么可写的？

bilingual.source: My school is very different from other schools.
bilingual.target: 我的学校和其他学校很不一样。

bilingual.source: How is Peter's school similar to yours?
bilingual.target: 彼得的学校和你的学校有什么相似之处？

list.abstract: SCHOOL（英 [skuːl]，美 [skuːl]），英语单词，作名词为学校；专科学校；学派。作动词为送…上学；使受教育；成群。作形容词为受过西化教育的；源自西方的。短语搭配有high school（高中，中学）。例句为“First, we are working to replicate these findings in more diverse school communities.（首先，我们正努力在更多样化的学校社区复制这些发现。）” SCHOOL相关近义词有academy、college等。
SCHOOL是《魔法禁书目录》中的暗部组织。直属于学园都市统括理事会，成员共有四人，首领是学园都市排名第二的超能力者垣根帝督，而其他三人分别是：誉望万化 狱彩海美 砂皿致密

yingyinNormal.en: I want Penny to enjoy school...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望佩妮能享受在学校...

yingyinNormal.en: What did happen at the school, Grace?
yingyinNormal.zh: 学校发生了什么，格蕾丝？

yingyinNormal.en: The troopers pursued them to the school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 士兵们追赶他们到学校。

yingyinNormal.en: So, how was your day at school? Fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天在学校过得怎么样？挺好的。

yingyinNormal.en: I know what it means. I went to law school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道什么意思，我读过法律学校。

yingyinNormal.en: Every year, the school has a student showcase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 学校每年一次会举办学生科技展。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her friends are going on a school camp.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和朋友们要去参加学校露营。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. Tomas Ruiz. I knew him in school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，托马斯·鲁伊兹，我在学校时认识他的。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone else in school will be your customers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 学校里的所有其他人则会成为你们的顾客。

yingyinNormal.en: 1987. The weekend you guys visited me at school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 1987年。你们俩上学校找我去的那个周末。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, sweetheart. How are you? How's the new school?
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，亲爱的，你呢？新学校怎么样？

yingyinNormal.en: You pretty much have the school wired, don't you, Troy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个学校都在你掌控之下，不是吗，特洛伊？

yingyinNormal.en: And as we discussed, the official school policy is abstinence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正像我们讨论过的，学校的规定是节欲。

yingyinNormal.en: The School Fete.
yingyinNormal.zh: 学校游园会。

yingyinNormal.en: May I present Miss Bunting? She teaches at the village school. I'm very interested in the school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来介绍下邦廷小姐，她在乡村学校教书。我对那个学校很感兴趣。

yingyinNormal.en: It is the day of the school fete. Miss Rabbit is running the raffle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是学校的游园日，兔小姐负责学校的抽奖活动。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I know, I was just... Boarding school is like... I don't even know why you went to boarding school to being with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我了解，我只是…寄宿学校就像... 我甚至不知道你为什么去寄宿学校。

yingyinNormal.en: And there's a whole orchard of school trees. So that school is free.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是这种树种上一整园的话，学校不就免费啦。

yingyinNormal.en: How's it going in here? Mom, tell Maya to come back to school, regular school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们谈的怎么样了？妈，快叫玛雅回去上学，正常的学校。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not that big of a deal. It's a huge deal. That school pumps out Nobel prize winners the way my school pumped out stomachs. Enough, mom!
yingyinNormal.zh: 没什么了不起的。很了不起，这学校出的诺贝尔奖得主比我们学校被搞大肚子的女生一样多。妈，够了！

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 地方教育董事会；校董会
职业学校；中专；职业中学

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 学校教育；训练马在平地比赛

word_family.mean: n. 学校；专科学校；学派；期末考试大厅；一伙赌徒；鱼群；海兽群；院；科；上课

examination_example.sentence: Koziatek's <highlight>school</highlight> is a wake-up call.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Koziatek的学校是一个警钟。

examination_example.sentence: Asked about his choice of career, he says at high <highlight>school</highlight> he considered medical <highlight>school</highlight> before switching to electrical engineering.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当被问及他的职业选择时，他说在转学电气工程之前，他在高中时考虑过医学院。

examination_example.sentence: It's true that high-<highlight>school</highlight> coding classes aren't essential for learning computer science in college.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 诚然，高中的编码课对于大学学习计算机科学来说并不是必不可少的。

sense_info_list.en: (of fish or sea mammals) form a large group

word_usage.usage:
school指“学校”时，是可数名词，常与形容词性物主代词或定冠词连用，例：
I'm going to the school today to talk to Kim's teacher.
今天我要去学校和金的老师谈一谈。
school指“上学；学业”时，是不可数名词，其前不用冠词。

direction_info.description:

examination_example.sentence: It isn't a <highlight>school</highlight> subject or an academic discipline, but it can be learned.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不是一门学校科目或学术学科，但它是可以习得的。

examination_example.sentence: The type of <highlight>school</highlight> students attend makes a difference to their future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生就读的学校类型对他们的未来有影响。

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn about the private <highlight>schools</highlight> in the UK?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于英国的私立学校，我们了解到什么？

sense_info_list.zh: 学校; 院系; 上学

examination_example.sentence: After World War IⅡ, a bunch of changes reshaped <highlight>schools</highlight>—and lunches.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 二战后，一系列变化重塑了学校——还有午餐。

examination_example.sentence: As <highlight>schools</highlight> have changed in the past century, the midday meal container has evolved right along with them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着上个世纪学校的变化，午餐盒也随之发展。

examination_example.sentence: For decades, activists have called for <highlight>schools</highlight> to offer anti-racism or multicultural curricula.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几十年来，积极分子一直呼吁学校提供反种族主义或多元文化课程。

examination_example.sentence: Every day after <highlight>school</highlight>, Joe's dad drives him to the restaurant so he can put his ideas straight on the wall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天放学后，乔的爸爸开车送他去餐馆，这样他就可以把他的想法直接画在墙上。

examination_example.sentence: Joe's parents decided to encourage his creativity by sending their son to an after-<highlight>school</highlight> art class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔的父母决定促进他的创造力，送他们的儿子去上课外美术课。

examination_example.sentence: Send him to an after-<highlight>school</highlight> art class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 送他去课后艺术课。

examination_example.sentence: Homework is an important part of <highlight>schooling</highlight>, but the purposes of giving children homework will change as they grow older.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家庭作业是学校教育的重要组成部分，布置作业的目的会随着孩子们长大而发生改变。

examination_example.sentence: At follow-up meetings, he urged parents to join him in advocating a "whole child" approach to <highlight>schooling</highlight> that respects "social-emotional development" and "deep and meaningful learning" over academics alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在接下来的会议中，他敦促家长们和他一样倡导“全人教育”，重视“社会情感发展”和“深入而有意义的学习”，而不是仅仅关注学业成绩。

word_usage.usage: after school (在放学以后), at school, from school, in school, to school 和 out of school 各种表达方式里都没有 a 或 the。

examination_example.sentence: Those were highest in status in high <highlight>school</highlight>, as well as those least liked in elementary <highlight>school</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些人在高中时地位最高，那些人在小学时最不受欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: One afternoon when I was in primary <highlight>school</highlight>, I was walking by the <highlight>school</highlight> playground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我上小学的时候，有一天下午，我在学校操场边散步。

examination_example.sentence: I'm going to do a one-month course at a language <highlight>school</highlight> and spend the rest of the time traveling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我打算在一所语言学校上一个月的课程，其余时间去旅行。

examination_example.sentence: Importance of home <highlight>schooling</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家庭培养的重要性。

word_usage.usage: after school（在放学以后）、at school、from school、in school、to school 和 out of school 各种表达方式里都没有 a 或 the。
school前加定冠词表示学校这个场所或建筑，不加定冠词表示抽象概念，即学校教育。像这样用的名词还有prison、church、hospital等。go to hospital意思是去看病， 而go to the hospital表示去医院探望病人或去办其他的事情。

examination_example.sentence: taking part in after-<highlight>school</highlight> activities in clubs
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参加俱乐部的校外活动。

examination_example.sentence: However, a <highlight>school</highlight> should not depend heavily on uniforms to improve students’ behaviors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从周二到周五在小学教英语和艺术

examination_example.sentence_trans: 从周二到周五在小学教英语和艺术

word_usage.usage:
go to school表示“去上学”，此时school前不必加任何冠词；go to the school表示"去（那所）学校”，表示到学校去做其他事情，而不是“去上学”。
如：I’m going to the school to visit my sister.
我打算去那所学校看望我的姐姐。
